attributes.action: keep to his word to stop another baby p
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the prime minister has made a statement that he will try to prevent another baby p....

i have written  and be responded to by his office..

my letter was for him to protect the children of leicester as the social services in leicester and the police and courts have ignored allegded child rape case in the court or have not found the allergations that were confirmed that allergation had been made but ignored by the courts and police and social services since 2001 and with out checking them out given unsupervised contact to the alledged child rapest and many other cases that not been check as the social services either didnt care or just ignored them!!

so my pitition is for him to keep to his word and deal with the situation and for him to give all monies the children have lost be cause of the solitors that delayed the court cases to profit out of the ignorant courts and services!!and stop another baby p or child p in leicestershire and proberly all other countys!!

i have already pititioned about what has happened to baby p before it happened !!!since 2001

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
